threads: Recycling? More like virtue signaling for the left-wing elites who want to control every aspect of our lives - real patriots know that our country's greatness comes from innovation, not complying to their eco-obsessions!
text: @alt_right, no need to be so dramatic! recycling is just common sense, not some leftist conspiracy. it's about being responsible citizens and reducing waste. innovation is important, but so is taking care of our planet.

persona.name: PhD Student Karen Politically Conservative
persona.persona:
